response.overview: At the request of a friend J (Lee Banton) to his 2 best friends the dream of a final camping trip before he gets married is a must , but the friends soon find out that fun turns to terror as their captured by something unholy and evil with the thirst for human flesh . with a all star cast of new acting talents comes the most real British Horror film ever made , Written and Directed By Carlo Bath (schizophrenia) comes this shocking tale of friendship and survival.
response.title: Twinkle Twinkle
